summary: Provides a complete mock implementation of the AWS SSO Admin (IAM Identity Center) service, including custom error types, inâ€‘memory data models for instances, permission sets, policies, and account assignments, and a response layer that maps incoming API calls to backend logic and returns JSON results.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with the AWS SSO Admin APIs without contacting real AWS endpoints, by offering a fully functional simulated service.
